setExperiment

Class CrossValidationSeparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • setExperiment.CrossValidationSeparator

  • public class CrossValidationSeparator
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads the dataset and prepares the data for the n-fold-cross validation experiment described in:

    F. Feger and I. Koprinska. Co–training Using RBF Nets and Different Feature Splits. In Proceedings of 2006 International Joint Conference on Neural Network, pp. 1878–1885, 2006.

    • Method Detail

      • prepareCrossValidationExperiment

        public CoTrainingData[] prepareCrossValidationExperiment()
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads the data and prepares the n-fold-cross validation experiment
        Returns:
        array of prepared CoTrainingData objects, each corresponding to one labeled/unlabeled/test split in n-fold-cross validation experiment
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the dataset files are missing or corrupt
